00213 /*
00214         @doc: keyboard
00215         @type:
00216                 generic
00217         @title:
00218                 Keyboard shortcuts
00219         @keyterms:
00220                 Keyboard shortcuts
00221         @short:
00222                 The list of the common keyboard shortcuts
00223         @body:
00224                 [big]All the standard keys alphabetically ordered[/big][br]
00225                 [b]F1:[/b] Help Index (Window)[br]
00226                 [b]Ctrl+A:[/b] Select all[br]
00227                 [b]Ctrl+B:[/b] Insert Bold control character[br]
00228                 [b]Ctrl+C:[/b] Copy to clipboard[br]
00229                 [b]Ctrl+F:[/b] Open "Find Text" dialog[br]
00230                 [b]Ctrl+L:[/b] Scroll to the "last read" line marker[br]
00231                 [b]Ctrl+I:[/b] Open "Insert icon" dialog[br]
00232                 [b]Ctrl+J:[/b] Open "Join Channels" dialog[br]
00233                 [b]Ctrl+K:[/b] Open "Insert Color" dialog[br]
00234                 [b]Ctrl+L:[/b] Scroll to the last read line[br]
00235                 [b]Ctrl+N:[/b] Open new context[br]
00236                 [b]Ctrl+O:[/b] Insert Reset control character[br]
00237                 [b]Ctrl+P:[/b] Insert "Plain text" control character[br]
00238                 [b]Ctrl+R:[/b] Insert Reverse control character[br]
00239                 [b]Ctrl+S:[/b] Open "Servers" dialog [br]
00240                 [b]Ctrl+U:[/b] Insert Underline control character[br]
00241                 [b]Ctrl+V:[/b] Paste clipboard contents[br]
00242                 [b]Ctrl+W:[/b] Close current window[br]
00243                 [b]Ctrl+X:[/b] Cut to clipboard[br]
00244                 [b]Ctrl+Y:[/b] Toggle the commandline's KVS/User-friendly mode[br]
00245                 [b]Ctrl+Z:[/b] Undo last action[br]
00246                 [b]Ctrl+"+":[/b] Increase font size[br]
00247                 [b]Ctrl+"-":[/b] Decrease font size[br]
00248                 [b]Ctrl+0:[/b] Restore default font (and font size)[br]
00249                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+A:[/b] Go away/back[br]
00250                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+B:[/b] Open "Manage Toolbars" dialog[br]
00251                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+C:[/b] Connect/disconnect current irc context[br]
00252                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+D:[/b] Open Class editor[br]
00253                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+E:[/b] Open Event editor[br]
00254                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+I:[/b] Open Identity options[br]
00255                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+L:[/b] Open Alias editor[br]
00256                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+M:[/b] Open "Manage Themes" dialog[br]
00257                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+N:[/b] Open "Manage Addons" dialog[br]
00258                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+O:[/b] Open "Options" dialog[br]
00259                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+P:[/b] Open Popup editor[br]
00260                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+Q:[/b] Open Action editor[br]
00261                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+R:[/b] Open Raw events editor[br]
00262                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+S:[/b] Open Script tester[br]
00263                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+T:[/b] Open "Theme Options" dialog[br]
00264                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+U:[/b] Open "Registered users" dialog[br]
00265                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+X:[/b] Open "Execute Script" dialog[br]
00266                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+Z:[/b] Redo last action[br]
00267 
00268                 [big]Window handling related keys:[/big][br]
00269                 [b]Alt+UpArrow:[/b] Previous window[br]
00270                 [b]Alt+DownArrow:[/b] Next window[br]
00271                 [b]Alt+Shift+UpArrow:[/b] Previous window in the same IRC context[br]
00272                 [b]Alt+Shift+DownArrow:[/b] Next window in the same IRC context[br]
00273                 [b]Alt+PageUp:[/b] Previous highlighted window[br]
00274                 [b]Alt+PageDown:[/b] Next highlighted window[br]
00275                 [b]Ctrl+UpArrow:[/b] Maximizes current window[br]
00276                 [b]Ctrl+DownArrow:[/b] Minimizes current window[br]
00277                 [b]PageUp:[/b] Scroll the output window up one page[br]
00278                 [b]PageDown:[/b] Scroll the output window down one page[br]
00279                 [b]Shift+PageUp:[/b] Scroll the output window up one line[br]
00280                 [b]Shift+PageDown:[/b] Scroll the output window down one line[br]
00281                 [b]Ctrl+L:[/b] Scroll to the last read line[br]
00282                 [b]Ctrl+W:[/b] Close current window[br]
00283 
00284                 [big]Text editing related hotkeys:[/big][br]
00285                 [b]Shift+LeftArrow:[/b] Select the previous character[br]
00286                 [b]Shift+RightArrow:[/b] Select the next character[br]
00287                 [b]Ctrl+LeftArrow:[/b] Move to the beginning of the previous word[br]
00288                 [b]Ctrl+RightArrow:[/b] Move to the end of the next word[br]
00289                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+LeftArrow:[/b] Select up to the beginning of the previous word[br]
00290                 [b]Ctrl+Shift+RightArrow:[/b] Select up to the end of the next word[br]
00291                 [b]Ctrl+Backspace:[/b] Delete last word[br]
00292                 [b]Ctrl+<digit>:[/b] Script accelerators (see OnAccelKeyPressed)[br]
00293                 [b]F2-F12, Shift+(F1-F12):[/b] Script accelerators (see OnAccelKeyPressed)[br]
00294                 [b]Ctrl+B:[/b] nsert the 'bold' mIRC text control character[br]
00295                 [b]Ctrl+K:[/b] Insert the 'color' mIRC text control character[br]
00296                 [b]Ctrl+R:[/b] Insert the 'reverse' mIRC text control character[br]
00297                 [b]Ctrl+U:[/b] Insert the 'underline' mIRC text control character[br]
00298                 [b]Ctrl+O:[/b] Insert the 'reset' mIRC text control character[br]
00299                 [b]Ctrl+P:[/b] Insert the 'non-crypt' (plain text) KVIrc control character used to disable[br] encryption of the current text line[br]
00300                 [b]Ctrl+C:[/b] Copy the selected text to clipboard[br]
00301                 [b]Ctrl+X:[/b] Cut the selected text[br]
00302                 [b]Ctrl+V:[/b] Paste the clipboard contents (same as middle mouse click)[br]
00303                 [b]Ctrl+I:[/b] Insert the 'icon' control code and pops up the icon list box[br]
00304                 [b]UpArrow:[/b] Move backward in the command history and in the history popup[br]
00305                 [b]DownArrow:[/b] Move forward in the command history and in the history popup[br]
00306                 [b]Ctrl+PageUp:[/b] Open the history popup[br]
00307                 [b]LeftArrow:[/b] Move the cursor to the left :)[br]
00308                 [b]RightArrow:[/b] Move the cursor to the right[br]
00309                 [b]Shift+LeftArrow:[/b] Move the selection to the left[br]
00310                 [b]Shift+RightArrow:[/b] Move the selection to the right[br]
00311                 [b]Alt+Enter:[/b] Show/hide the multiline editor[br]
00312                 [b]Ctrl+Enter:[/b] Send message as plain text, ignoring / commands[br]
00313                 [b]Alt+<numeric_sequence>:[/b] Insert the character by ASCII/Unicode code[br]
00314                 [example]
00315                 [b]Alt+32:[/b] Inserts ASCII/Unicode character 32: ' ' (a space)
00316                 [b]Alt+00032:[/b] Same as above :)
00317                 [b]Alt+13:[/b] Inserts the Carriage Return (CR) control character
00318                 [b]Alt+77:[/b] Inserts ASCII/Unicode character 77: 'M'
00319                 [b]Alt+23566:[/b] Inserts Unicode character 23566 (an ideogram)
00320                 [/example]
00321 
00322                 [big]Completion hotkeys[/big][br]
00323                 [b]Tab in the first word of input:[/b] Complete nicknames in the current channel or query[br]
00324                 [b]Shift+Tab after the first word of input:[/b] Complete nicknames with full mask in the current channel or query[br]
00325                 [b]Tab after a leading /:[/b] Complete commands[br]
00326                 [b]Tab after a / in the middle of input:[/b] Complete directories[br]
00327                 [b]Tab after a $:[/b] Complete function names
00328 */
00329 
00330 #endif //_KVI_SHORTCUTS_H_
